title: Rhinoroller

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Transport 2 players.
- Spin around a target to redirect all their visitors to themselves. (2 uses)
- Rhinoroller's ultimate ability, Give a ride to your target, cannot be a Mutant killing, they may act thrice in the next night and twice in the one after that, you may also multitask all your abilities when using this. (2 uses, shared by non-killing mutants)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may choose to give players the Transport notification when transporting.
- Redirect immune.

desc:
Post 3517
*A mix between a rhinoceros, an armadillo, and a lion. With the notable feature of being able to curl into a ball.*
